un-nep-Deva-Latn-2013.name: REPORT ON THE CURRENT STATUS OF UNITED NATIONS ROMANIZATION SYSTEMS FOR GEOGRAPHICAL NAMES -- Nepali Romanization, 1972
un-nep-Deva-Latn-2013.description:
The United Nations recommended system was approved in 1972 (II/11), based on a report
prepared by D. N. Sharma. The note on the system was published in volume II of the
conference report.

There is no evidence of the use of the system either in Nepal or in international cartographic
products. The resolution IV/17 (1982) recommended association, inter alia, with Nepal in
carrying out further studies on the system. In Nepal a system of romanization is employed by
the Nepal Survey Department (NSD). This system has been applied to names appearing on
national mapping, and it is also used in the Geographic Information Infrastructure Programme
(NGIIP).

Nepali (Nepālī) uses the alphasyllabic script Devanāgarī.
notes: In normal spelling ṙ and ṙh are not marked, instead dotless ड ḍa, ढ ḍha are used to denote these sounds.
Ligatures may be formed with r as the first component: ~ह rha.

tests.source: नेपाल
tests.expected: nepāl

tests.source: नेपाल काठ्माडौं
tests.expected: nepāl kāṭhmāḍauṁ

tests.source: लेखन
tests.expected: lekhan

tests.source: मुद्रा
tests.expected: mudrā

tests.source: प्रशंसा
tests.expected: prashaṁsā

tests.source: अंक
tests.expected: aṁk

tests.source: नेकपाले स्थगित स्थायी कमिटीको बैठक भदौ गते बोलाउने भएको
tests.expected: nekapāle sthagit sthāyī kamiṭīko baiṭhak bhadau gate bolāune bhaeko

tests.source: न घर रह्यो, न परिवार
tests.expected: n ghar rahyo, n parivār

tests.source: ढोरपाटनमा भुजीखोला बाढीपहिरोले अभिभावक गुमाएका बालबालिकाको बिचल्ली
tests.expected: ḍhorapāṭanamā bhujīkholā bāḍhīpahirole abhibhāvak gumāekā bālabālikāko bichallī

tests.source: सुस्मिताका काका हेमबहादुर र काकीलाई पनि पहिरोले बगायो
tests.expected: susmitākā kākā hemabahādur r kākīlāī pani pahirole bagāyo

tests.source: संविधान जारी भएसँगै सार्वजनिक प्रशासनमा नयाँ उत्साह आउने अपेक्षा थियो
tests.expected: saṁvidhān jārī bhaesam̐gai sārvajanik prashāsanamā nayām̐ utsāh āune apekṣhā thiyo

tests.source: देशमा कोरोना संक्रमित र मृतकको संख्या हरेक दिन बढ्दो छ
tests.expected: deshamā koronā saṁkramit r mṛtakako saṁkhyā harek din baḍhdo chh

tests.source: गाउँपालिकाका अध्यक्ष टिका गुरुङका अनुसार विष्णुदासलाई राजुले सुत्नका लागि बेलुका साथी लगेका थिए
tests.expected: gāum̐pālikākā adhyakṣh ṭikā guruṅakā anusār viṣhṇudāsalāī rājule sutnakā lāgi belukā sāthī lagekā thie

tests.source: यो आयोजना गाउँपालिकाको केन्द्र तेल्लोकमा पर्छ
tests.expected: yo āyojanā gāum̐pālikāko kendr tellokamā parchh

tests.source: सुस्मिताका काका हेमबहादुर र काकीलाई पनि पहिरोले बगायो
tests.expected: susmitākā kākā hemabahādur r kākīlāī pani pahirole bagāyo

tests.source: चैत पहिलो साता घर आएका उनी लकडाउन भएपछि यतै रोकिए
tests.expected: chait pahilo sātā ghar āekā unī lakaḍāun bhaepachhi yatai rokie

tests.source: काम गर्न जानेको हकमा रोजगारदाता कम्पनीको पत्रसँगै वडा र जिल्ला प्रशासनको सिफारिस अनिवार्य गरिएको छ
tests.expected: kām garn jāneko hakamā rojagāradātā kampanīko patrasam̐gai vaḍā r jillā prashāsanako siphāris anivāry garieko chh

tests.source: म त पहाडको एउटा गाउँबाट उडेर तल झरेको सिमल भुवा हुँ
tests.expected: m t pahāḍako euṭā gāum̐bāṭ uḍer tal jhareko simal bhuvā hum̐

tests.source: अचम्म, धेरैले चिन्ने र सहजै बुझ्ने खालको चलेकै कवि पो भएँ
tests.expected: achamm, dheraile chinne r sahajai bujhne khālako chalekai kavi po bhaem̐

tests.source: कतिपय सन्दर्भ र राजनीतिक रूपमा फाइदा हुने कुरामा कवि घिमिरेले गर्ने गरेको टिप्पणी पनि नेपाली लेखकमाझ आलोचित हुन्थ्यो
tests.expected: katipay sandarbh r rājanītik rūpamā phāidā hune kurāmā kavi ghimirele garne gareko ṭippaṇī pani nepālī lekhakamājh ālochit hunthyo
